extractors.followersGreaterThan: (params) => { const count = parseInt(followers.replace(/[,k]/gi, '').replace('K', '000').replace('M', '000000')); return count > params.count; }
extractors.engagementRate: (params) => { const followerCount = parseInt(followers.replace(/[,k]/gi, '').replace('K', '000').replace('M', '000000')); const postCount = parseInt(posts.replace(/[,]/g, '')); if (postCount === 0) return false; return (followerCount / postCount) > params.minRate; }
extractors.followRatio: () => { const followerCount = parseInt(followers.replace(/[,k]/gi, '').replace('K', '000').replace('M', '000000')); const followingCount = parseInt(following.replace(/[,k]/gi, '').replace('K', '000').replace('M', '000000')); return followerCount / (followingCount || 1); }

supportedClaims.name: followersGreaterThan
supportedClaims.description: Proves follower count is greater than specified number

supportedClaims.name: isInfluencer
supportedClaims.description: Proves account has influencer status (>10k followers)

supportedClaims.name: engagementRate
supportedClaims.description: Proves engagement rate meets minimum threshold

supportedClaims.name: isBusinessAccount
supportedClaims.description: Proves account is marked as business account
